meanings.definition: Relating to or marking the completion of a period of 100 years.
meanings.sent1: The centenary event was a grand celebration of a hundred years.
meanings.sent2: The centenary decorations were colorful and festive.
meanings.sent3: The centenary cake was so big, it took a team to carry it!
meanings.sent4: The centenary milestone was a testament to the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The centenary anniversary was a once-in-a-lifetime occasion.

meanings.sent1: The centenary of the school was a joyful occasion for all.
meanings.sent2: The centenary of the town was marked with a parade.
meanings.sent3: At the centenary party, everyone danced like it was 1919!
meanings.sent4: The centenary of the library was a time to reflect on history.
meanings.sent5: The centenary celebration brought the community together in unity.
